body_html:
Great, that solved it.
I first installed v2018 of MKL, as you suggested with conda install mkl=2018.
Then, I removed the path of the older MKL version from $LD_LIBRARY_PATH and added the path of the new version. Now, the error disappeared. Thanks for your help.
body_text:
Great, that solved it.
I first installed v2018 of MKL, as you suggested with conda install mkl=2018.
Then, I removed the path of the older MKL version from $LD_LIBRARY_PATH and added the path of the new version. Now, the error disappeared. Thanks for your help.
body:
Great, that solved it. 
I first installed v2018 of MKL, as you suggested with `conda install mkl=2018`.
Then, I removed the path of the older MKL version from `$LD_LIBRARY_PATH` and added the path of the new version. Now, the error disappeared. Thanks for your help.
